original_text: It included the land of Gilead, and the land of the Geshurites and Maakathites. It included all of Hermon mountain, and Bashan as far as Salecah.
korean_text: 길르앗과 및 그술 족속과 마아갓 족속의 지역과 온 헤르몬 산과 살르가까지 온 바산

sentences.original_text: It included the land of Gilead
and the land of the Geshurites and Maakathites
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 게술 사람과 마아가 사람의 땅도 포함했습니다

sentences.original_text: It included all of Hermon mountain
and Bashan as far as Salecah
